name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades
display_help: You are a master of fighting with a blade in each hand. Your precision and skill with the blades enable you to strike in numerous combinations, each of which has unique secondary effects on a target which withstands your onslaught.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades.Light_Opening
powers.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 17.52 lethal damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 35.00 lethal damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 7.88 fire damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades.Moderate_Opening
powers.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 3 ticks of 16.13 lethal damage over 1s on target
3 ticks of 29.41 lethal damage over 1s on target
3 ticks of 7.26 fire damage over 1s on target
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades.Moderate_Bridge
powers.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 27.53 lethal damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
-7.50% strength to defense for 10s on target
2 ticks of 38.39 lethal damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 12.39 fire damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades.AoE_Bridge

powers.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Dual_Blades.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate
